item.description: SINGLES LET?S EAT OUT at Century Buffet, Bristol at 6 pm. This is a great way to meet new people and have a delicious meal. It will be a relaxing fun evening. Come join us! Admission $15. To reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Directions to 623 Farmington Ave: I 84 Exit 38 (Rt. 6W), continue on Colt Highway (Rt. 6) past Home Depot 7.4 miles, facility on right in Bristol Plaza on right of Stop and Shop.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner Evening
